column4: hey guys. i need some serious help. I am getting VERY frustrated. First and foremost, every time I try to access my home folder via the panel on top, it says error. This happens with documents, computer etc. Please help me find out why this happening.
I had this problem before on an older install
I back up all my stuff so often that I don't even mess with stuff like that
Oh surely it isn't. I just didn't bother trying to find the way to do it, because I was lazy and needed my computer to work and didn't want to spend time fixing it.
How long have you been using linux?
by any chance, do you know how to use wine to run photoshop 7?
about 3 weeks. I'm a big noobie.
http://appdb.winehq.org/appview.php?iVersionId=1336 It seems to run fine out of the box.
isn't that just a trial though?
you should be able to put in the product key
awesome. Thanks for the help. Any ideas on where to point me with the other issue we were taking about?
None at all. What I CAN say is that I've had less problems with Ubuntu than I've had with FC and Mandrake, and that Ubuntu is "where it's at" as they say.
So stick to this distro! Don't be swayed! :P
well i'm glad I at least went with the right linux distro lol ;P. Not just to get "hip" with this linux stuff as they say.
Got to go but thanks for the help :D!
